articles.title: If You Always Hit The Snooze Button, Here's 35 Things To Help You Get Ready Quickly In 2025
articles.author: Kayla Boyd
articles.summary: Several new beauty and personal care products aim to streamline morning routines. The Revlon one-step hair dryer and volumizer assists in quick hair styling. Dry shampoo foam refreshes hair between washes. Maybelline BB cream simplifies skin routines by combining multiple steps into one product.

articles.title: Stylish And Comfy Warm Weather Pieces From Abercrombie
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: The article presents a collection of new clothing items, ranging from denim shorts and sporty tie dresses to satin midi skirts and baseball caps.  Several items are available in multiple sizes and colors, and prices are provided for each product.

articles.title: Amazon claims its ‘constantly inviting' new customers to Alexa Plus
articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa Plus, a generative AI-updated version of Alexa, in February. It is available to Amazon Prime subscribers for free or for $19.99 a month. Amazon has granted access to hundreds of thousands of customers through an early access program, with ongoing invitations being sent out.

articles.title: 36 Products So Good, Nothing Else Can Compete
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article introduces various new products. These include an under-eye brightener containing hyaluronic acid and shea butter, a stainless-steel water bottle with a double-spout, Essence Lash Princess mascara for dramatic lashes, antimicrobial toothbrushes with nano-silver, and a cleansing oil for sensitive skin. Other products include a set of double-sided shower rings, callus-removal gel, teeth-whitening pens, Snuggle Puppy, warming foot masks, Wet & Forget cleaner, Sol de Janeiro body cream, Compound W One Step Pads, a wrapping paper cutter, nail and cuticle care oil, acne patches, patio crack weeder tool, Grampa's Weeder, snail essence, pet hair remover, dishwasher cleaning tablets, bug bite suction tool, portable luggage scale, self-tanning mousse, after-sun soothing cream, hair and body fragrance mist, butt acne-clearing lotion, shaved sheep plushie, clinical strength deodorant, curl spray leave-in conditioner, Nippies pasties, veggie chopper, carpet and upholstery cleaner, Liquid I.V. electrolyte drink mix, cold sore healing patches, and Kegel exercise weights.

articles.title: Gennady is a slimy anti-Mario platformer in which you harvest larvae and turn into a squirrel
articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.summary: Gennady, a new platform game, features procedurally generated alien cubes in a squelchy world. The game blends elements of Dead Cells and Earthworm Jim, offering roguelite progression and comicbook animation. Players control a grumpy middle-aged man in heart-print boxers within this unique realm.

articles.title: Yet another Persona 5 spinoff is launching next month, this time a gacha game with a new group of Phantom Thieves
articles.author: Oisin Kuhnke
articles.summary: Atlus will launch Persona 5: The Phantom X, a mobile game previously in open beta in China, westward. The game will also be released on PC.

articles.title: Shack Chat: Which city should get a Nintendo Store?
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Nintendo is opening a new Nintendo Store in San Francisco. This launch represents a new retail location for the company.

articles.title: Android 16: Google's Foldable Focus – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google showcased Android 16 with UI changes and new animations. Google may be taking foldables seriously which would lead to technological advances in foldable devices. Companies such as Samsung are building foldables such as Galaxy Z Fold or Pixel Fold, these foldables have the potential to replace phones, tablets, and laptops in the future.

articles.title: New Look's versatile £34 shirt dress looks so chic and 'will take you anywhere'
articles.summary: New Look has introduced the Linen-Look Shirred Waist Midi Shirt Dress, priced at £33.99, available in camel, navy, black, and orange. The dress features shirring around the waist and is made of a linen, cotton, and viscose blend. Customer reviews highlight its versatility and quality.

articles.title: Most Father's Day Gifts Are Junk. We Found the Ones Truly Worthy of Dad
articles.author: David Carnoy
articles.summary: Anker has updated its 622 MagGo magnetic battery, relocating the charging port to the side for simultaneous charging and stand usage. Beer Drop, a beer delivery service, allows customers to customize their orders by selecting specific beer styles and types.

articles.title: Don't Let Google Maps Glitches Ruin Your Memorial Day Weekend Plans
articles.author: Macy Meyer
articles.summary: Google Maps has introduced new AI-powered updates which provides itinerary suggestions and immersive views of destinations. The updates aim to make travel planning more personalized and stress-free. Also Google Maps has a Directory tab for airports, malls and transit stations which can be accessed by simply searching for an airport.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 Price Drop: Major Sale – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: Janhoi Mcgregor
articles.summary: Samsung has reduced the price of the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and offers up to $1000 in trade-in value for old phones.  Additionally, Samsung provides free subscriptions to services like Peacock Premium, SiriusXM, and Adobe Lightroom with the purchase of the Galaxy Z Fold 6. Amazon is also offering a discount on the Galaxy Z Fold 6, matching Samsung's price with no trade-in.

articles.title: Amazon has 20% off an XL duster to clean those hard-to-reach places
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: A handy extendable duster is being introduced to help with spring cleaning, enabling users to maintain cleanliness year-round.

articles.title: Amazon £12 waterproof mattress protector is 'soft', 'breathable' and great for toddlers
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the Waterproof Mattress Protector for £11.90. Crafted from polycotton, the Waterproof Mattress Protector can protect any mattress against fluids. Other features include a non-noisy TPU membrane for a dry night sleep.

articles.title: OPPO launches  A5x  in Bangladesh at economical prices
articles.summary: OPPO is launching the OPPO A5x smartphone in Bangladesh on May 15, 2025. The A5x features IP65 water and dust resistance, Military-Grade Drop Protection, and AI-powered photography features. It also includes a 32MP rear camera, a 5MP front camera, and a 6.67-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: The best Waitrose wines under £10 this month
articles.author: Aidy Smith
articles.summary: Waitrose offers a selection of wines, including Codorníu Cava, known for its organic nature and elegance; Villa Maria's Private Bin Sauvignon Blanc, a vibrant New Zealand wine; and Le Bijou Rosé de Sophie Valrose, a sophisticated rosé from the Languedoc region. These wines provide diverse options for various occasions, with some offers available until May 20th, 2025.

articles.title: 6 Things to Consider Before Buying Your First Foldable Phone
articles.author: Ayush Jalan
articles.summary: Samsung's TaskBar improves Galaxy Fold phones. OnePlus' Open Canvas enhances multitasking. Vivo X Fold3 Pro uses silicon-carbon batteries for a 5700mAh capacity.  Foldable phones, including those from Google, Oppo, Honor and Apple, face challenges related to battery life, screen ratio, and device thickness, which companies are working to improve.

articles.title: This 75-inch 4K Hisense Fire TV is a steal at nearly 30% off on Amazon
articles.author: Chris Bayer
articles.summary: Hisense offers a brand-new 75-inch TV that is available with a 20% discount.

articles.title: Not just chatbots, now it's AI AGENTS
articles.author: Jon Rappoport
articles.summary: Alibaba Cloud launched an MCP marketplace through its AI model hosting platform ModelScope. This marketplace offers more than 1,000 services connecting to mapping tools, office collaboration platforms, online storage services, and various Google services. The marketplace aims to transform AI assistants into powerful digital helpers.

articles.title: 36 Products Just For Feet (Unless They Disgust You)
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Several new foot care products and services are introduced. These include medicated waterproof bandages, callus-removing gel, vegan urea foot cream, espadrille platform sandals, wearable freezer gel wraps, ankle wedges, foot exfoliating peel masks, self-heating soothing foot masks, and Frida Mom leg and foot moisturizing spray designed for pregnant women. Other products mentioned are: natural-stone rock mat, suede heel grips, chunky sneakers, fungal nail renewal formula with an electric file, Carpe antiperspirant foot lotion, lace-up slip-on sneakers, Aerothotic flip-flops, Sanuk Yoga Mat Flip-Flops, a cooling foot massager, an orthotic insole insert, Ugg insoles, acupressure slides, foot file, Birkenstock slides, a portable silicone foot scrubber, Teva sandals, Allbirds Tree Runners, moisturizing socks, toenail brace set, an electric foot massager, deodorizer shoe spray, Gold Bond medicated foot powder, slip-on sneakers, antifungal tea tree balm, and Dr. Scholl's slide-on sneakers

articles.title: Huawei's first trifold is a great phone that you shouldn't buy
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT, a trifold phone, showcasing technological prowess. The Mate XT features three different devices in one: a regular phone with a 6.4-inch display, a 7.9-inch display, and a 10.2-inch display.

articles.title: Wayfair is offering an insane deal on the GE Profile Nugget Ice Maker
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering a deal on the GE Profile Opal 2.0 Nugget Ice Maker for $388, reduced from $550, during its Memorial Day Clearance event. The GE Profile Opal 2.0 Nugget Ice Maker produces chewable nugget ice, stores the ice, and includes WiFi connectivity with the SmartHQ app for monitoring and voice control.

articles.title: You'll Kick Yourself For Not Buying These 38 Wildly Effective Cleaning Solutions Years Ago
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The content presents a range of cleaning products designed for various household needs. These products include stain removers, air purifiers, degreasers, and specialized cleaners for appliances like ovens, dishwashers, and coffee makers. The products aim to provide efficient and easy cleaning solutions for different surfaces and appliances.

articles.title: 33 Products You Need For The Beach
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Neutrogena offers Beach Defense Water Resistant Sunscreen with SPF 70, providing water resistance for up to 80 minutes. Black Girl Sunscreen features a Broad Spectrum SPF 30 designed for dark skin tones, offering moisturization alongside sun protection. Sun Bum offers a vegan and reef-safe scalp and hair mist for sun protection.

articles.title: 34 Products For If You're Sleepy, Achy, Itchy, Stressed
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various companies are launching new products and services aimed at improving sleep, relaxation, and overall well-being. Dr Teal's introduces a Sleep Spray with melatonin, while Hatch launches the Restore 3, a sunrise alarm and sound machine. First Aid Beauty releases the KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant for skin smoothing.

articles.title: DPIIT inks pact with GEAPP to support climate-tech start-ups
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: GEAPP is set to launch a competitive platform. This initiative signifies the introduction of a new service or product into the market.

articles.title: Best VPN for Android 2025: NordVPN Voted Best of VPNs for Android
articles.author: Nord VPN
articles.summary: NordVPN's Android app was voted Best VPN for Android in 2025, highlighting its user-friendly interface, optimized speeds via the NordLynx protocol, and enhanced security with features like Threat Protection Lite. The update also includes improvements to customer support accessibility with 24/7 live chat and email support, and various payment methods.

articles.title: Next £40 olive dress with 'textured' skirt is 'flowy' and 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the Olive Green Crinkle Texture Jersey/Woven Mix Midi Dress for £40. The dress comes in olive green and navy blue, featuring a crinkle effect woven skirting with side pockets and is available in sizes 6-20 Tall.

articles.title: Shanghai unveils measures to further boost 'debut economy'
articles.author: 刘小卓
org: Shanghai Assessment and Research Center of Product Quality System
articles.summary: Shanghai Municipal Commission of Commerce and Shanghai Customs jointly released pilot measures to streamline inspections of imported products for the "First in Shanghai" initiative, optimizing the environment for new product launches. The initiative aims to accelerate customs clearance efficiency for consumer goods, with 14 multinational enterprises and 20 consumer product brands applying to join a white list since its launch in April 23. Efficiency of average customs clearance is expected to increase by over 80 percent with these new measures.

articles.title: Johnnie Walker Blonde Launches in Ghana: A new whisky for a new generation
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker and Guinness Ghana have launched Johnnie Walker Blonde in Ghana, a new, lighter style of Scotch whisky designed for a new generation of drinkers. It offers flavors of soft vanilla, creamy toffee, and citrus, and is intended to be enjoyed neat, over ice, or with lemonade.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge comes with a £578 tech bundle in unbeatable pre-order deal
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmer version of the S25 smartphone. Mobiles.co.uk offers a pre-order deal including a £578 tech bundle with items like Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro and Samsung Watch 7 for select tariffs.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge comes with £578 bundle in unbeatable deal
articles.author: Jake Hackney Reporter
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmer and lighter version of the S25 with a 6.7' QHD display and a 200MP camera. Mobiles.co.uk offers a pre-order bundle including a Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro, Samsung Watch 7, clear case, 45W fast charger, and double storage. The S25 Edge is scheduled for release on May 30.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge comes with a £578 tech bundle in unbeatable pre-order deal
articles.author: Jake Hackney Reporter
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmer and lighter version of the S25 with a 6.7' QHD display and a 200MP camera, set to release on May 30. Mobiles.co.uk is offering a free bundle including Galaxy Buds3 Pro, Galaxy Watch7, a clear case, and a 45W fast charger with select orders of the S25 Edge for a limited time.

articles.title: Lidl launches new summer sandals – they're made from leather, with comfy footbed & they're cheaper than Aldi's pair
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lidl is launching new Livergy Sandals for £7.99 on May 18, available in black and brown for both men and women. Aldi also introduced Adults' Footbed Sandals for £9.99 on May 15, alongside kids' sandals. Lidl is also launching shirt dresses for £9.99 and Esmara Ladies' Muslin Long Sleeve Shirts in a two for £12 offer.

articles.title: Lidl launches new summer sandals – they're made from leather, with comfy footbed & they're cheaper than Aldi's pair
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lidl is launching new Livergy summer sandals for £7.99 as part of its Middle Aisle offers starting May 18. The sandals feature leather insoles, adjustable buckles, and an anatomically made foot bed, and are available in men's and women's sizes in black and brown.

articles.title: Netflix Unveils AI-Driven Ads That Blend Seamlessly into Shows
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Netflix is launching a new AI-powered advertising format designed to blend branded products into content inspired by its popular shows and movies. The company aims to make ads feel less intrusive and more engaging, with placements mid-show or during pause screens. This innovative approach coincides with the major growth of Netflix's ad-supported tier.

articles.title: Canon India & Dentsu creative Webchutney launch ‘Go Beyond' Campaign
articles.summary: Canon India, in partnership with Dentsu Creative Webchutney, has launched its 'Go Beyond' campaign for its printer range. The campaign aims to transform printing into a tool for self-expression and innovation, targeting students, entrepreneurs, and makers, empowering them to bring bold ideas to life. The campaign is rolled out across social media, digital video, and creator-led content.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret swimsuit is £140 cheaper than designer version
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new swimwear collection featuring a crinkle swimsuit priced at £35. The swimsuit is designed with an ultra-stretchy textured scrunch fabric and is available in various styles, including a one-piece and bikini separates. This new collection offers a more affordable alternative to designer swimwear brands like Hunza G.

articles.title: I'm a fashion writer and Next's £34 no-crease holiday dress is the key to packing light
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Next has launched the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, priced at £34, available in four colors and sizes 6 to 22. The dress is made from a cotton-blend jersey fabric and features adjustable shoulder straps, designed for comfort and versatility for both casual and evening wear.

articles.title: I tried the popular chicken takeaway which has a run in with Elon Musk
articles.author: Leah Collins
articles.summary: Colorado's chicken has launched a new 'peri range' of menu items at its Bolton and Bury locations. The new range includes peri chicken burger, spicy dip burger with fries, half peri chicken with rice and a variety of milkshakes.

articles.title: Ncell brings flash sale offer with attractive data packs
articles.author: Kantipur Media Group
articles.summary: Ncell has updated its weekly Flash Sales offer to include 24-hour unlimited access to social media platforms like TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, or YouTube for customers purchasing selected data packs via the Ncell App or Ncell Pasal App every Saturday from May 17 to June 14. Several data packs, including Double Majja, Data Renewal, and Home and Away Renewal packs, offer this bonus.

articles.title: 34 Items You'll Pat Yourself On The Back For Buying
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Eos introduced Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, extending its popular "cashmere" line. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption and pore blurring. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in PINK Honey, a new version of its iconic "Black Honey." Oxo released the new compact Brew Rapid Brewer for quick cold brew making.

articles.title: I tried butters from Aldi, Tesco and more — the winner was so indulgent
articles.author: Vita Molyneux
articles.summary: The article reviews seven salted butter brands: All Things Butter, Lurpak, Kerrygold, Anchor, Tesco own brand, Aldi Cowbelle, and Lidl Dairy Manor. All Things Butter is praised for its rich, creamy, and luxurious taste, while Aldi Cowbelle is noted for its excellent spreadability and salty flavor. Tesco's own brand, however, received a low rating due to its oily and flavorless profile.

articles.title: Google to give app devs access to Gemini Nano for on-device AI
articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.summary: Google is expected to announce a new set of APIs at I/O next week, enabling developers to utilize Gemini Nano for on-device AI. This launch includes updating the ML Kit SDK with API support for on-device generative AI features.

articles.title: Lazy River Products opens in Tewksbury
articles.author: Submitted article
articles.summary: Lazy River Products, a cannabis dispensary, opened in Tewksbury on April 16. The store incorporates new technology, including a 'smell bar' and the 'Peak Beyond' system with NFC chips for displaying product information.

articles.title: Hurray for dirt-busting Hurafan
articles.author: Mogens Johansen
articles.summary: Altronics stores are selling the Hurafan X, a USB rechargeable three-speed jet fan with a vacuum accessory. The Hurafan X lasts for up to 1.5 hours per use and is available for $129. During May, Altronics is including the vacuum attachment, usually costing $14.95, for free.

articles.title: Tangled in debates, AI makes an entry to salons
org: Guangdong Modern Urban Industrial Technology Research Institute
articles.summary: AI-powered hair washing machines are being introduced in major Chinese cities, offering an automated hair washing service. These machines, which use infrared sensors and water jets, have appeared in provinces such as Guangdong and Fujian, providing a novel and cost-effective experience for customers, while some industry experts express concerns about safety and marketing, Bai Yali opened Fujian's first AI hair washing shop in Xiamen last month.

articles.title: 29 Things That Will Probably Make You Think 'This Is What I've Been Waiting For' As Soon As You Try Them
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: Gold Bond released a hypoallergenic neck and chest cream that firms skin, visibly improving texture and elasticity. Wet & Forget introduced a bleach-free shower cleaner that prevents soap scum buildup. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder compact which eliminates oily shine without sacrificing the lit-from-within glow.

articles.title: Netflix to introduce AI-generated ads appearing within shows and movies; here's what the company said
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing AI-generated advertising formats, including pause ads and interactive midroll ads, on its ad-supported tier by 2026. These new ad formats will integrate advertiser products with Netflix shows and movies, offering a more relevant experience for viewers. The company's ad-supported plan has more than 94 million global monthly active users.

articles.title: Tangled in debates, AI makes an entry to salons
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Companies in China are introducing "AI-powered hair washing machines" as a new service in major cities. This service aims to offer convenience, especially for introverted customers, by using artificial intelligence in the hair washing process.

articles.title: Dual driver audio and noise-free clear calls, HUAWEI FreeBuds 6 are mid-range earbuds with premium chops
articles.author: Gulf Today
articles.summary: Huawei is introducing the FreeBuds 6.

articles.title: Tropical Sno returns to Marshalltown
articles.author: Lana Bradstream
articles.summary: Tropical Sno had its grand opening of a shaved ice truck on Friday afternoon. Owner Megan Mohon brought the summer treat back to Marshalltown and offers a 'huge' flavor selection, including Tiger's Blood. The Tropical Sno season is set to last until Oct. 31, with potential bookings for events.

articles.title: LILYSILK Debuts Capsule Collection Made with Liberty Fabrics, Blending British Heritage and Sustainable Silk
articles.author: Sunnyside Daily Sun
articles.summary: LILYSILK, identified as the world's leading silk brand, has a new announcement.

articles.title: The latest Nothing Phone 3 leak hints at chipset, camera, and battery specifications
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nothing is planning to launch a new flagship product, possibly in July.
